comments.author: Oleg Kalnichevski
comments.body:
Roland

Why not make NO_HOST a little prettier? 

public static final HttpHost NO_HOST = new HttpHost("", -1, "");

Oleg

description: Since we don't want to delay client alpha3 until HTTPCORE-139 is solved in beta2, we need a parameter specific solution for unsetting these client parameters on the request level.
summary: allow unsetting of DEFAULT_PROXY and FORCED_ROUTE parameters in the client stack
